get.description: Retrieves all todos from the store
Retrieves a specific todo by its ID

put.description: Updates an existing todo item completely

patch.description: Updates specific fields of an existing todo item

get.description: Exports all todos as a downloadable HTML file. Returns 204 No Content if no todos exist.

200.description: Downloadable HTML file containing all todos in a formatted table

get.description: Demonstrates all primitive types handled by TypeDocumentTransformer as query parameters: string, int, long, decimal, double, float, bool, DateTime, DateOnly, TimeOnly, Guid, and arrays

post.description: Demonstrates all primitive types handled by TypeDocumentTransformer: string, int, long, short, byte, decimal, double, float, bool, DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, TimeOnly, Guid, arrays, and nested objects

Demonstrates all primitive types handled by TypeDocumentTransformer as form data: string, int, long, short, byte, decimal, double, float, bool, DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, TimeOnly, Guid, arrays, nested objects, and file uploads (IFormFile, IFormFileCollection)
